titles.title: Ferry Service Expansion Act
Ferry Service Expansion Act
A bill to increase authorizations for the passenger ferry competitive grant program and the ferry boats and terminal facilities formula grant program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Ferry Service Expansion Act
This bill revises and increases funding for grant programs related to ferry boats and ferry terminal facilities, including by making certain passenger ferries eligible and qualified vessels for capital construction funds.
